channel.title: Cracked Launcher (UPDATED)
channel.description:
[s]I think I have found an exploit within the LauncherFrame.java within the minecraft.jar launcher. The method "login(String userName, String password)" should easily be able to me modified to (still connect to the server for validity), but set the username to a new String (declared in the globals), and actually use this set string as the username to call "launcher.init(userName, null, null, null);" within the method "canPlayOffline(String userName)".
I think this is more than enough information for someone to decompile the needed class, repair it, and exploit it. I am currently working on setting up Jode (doesn't wanna work for some reason) to use to compare side-by-side with my Jad made LauncherFrame.java. This (i believe) is the only class that needs modifying to exploit the entire minecraft game (mostly), as within the "login(String userName, String password)" method, you can also trick it to ALWAYS think it was a successful login if you wanted to.
Please give some credits if you do this before I do and it works (as It was my idea right?)
Finished a proof of concept, I am not 100% sure this will work in mac (confirmed windows and linux) (if someone could please confirm for mac), as I am currently fixing this in Linux, I will try to reboot into Win7 test it out and see how it goes. I do not believe this will download the newest version as I think I have disabled that (it requires a login stuff from what I have read, but I have provided the client with a bit of false information from a previous login of my own. No danger to my account though.
Update: Now auto-updates to the newest version even with bad login details (unpaid account or un-registered) [/s] Please refer to this topic: http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,487009.0.html

item.title: Cracked Launcher (UPDATED)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Could be possible but I have no idea who KingAgnostic is, and I did this myself lol. I have Notch’s newest launcher cracked as well, just haven’t released it because of no need. I figure I will release a custom launcher eventually instead.

Read full topic

item.title: Cracked Launcher (UPDATED)
item.dc:creator: @Combatkings Combatkings
item.description:
@Combatkings wrote:

I downloaded it but I don’t know what I have to use to open the file. What application should I use to open it???

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:1, topic:383335”][s]I think I have found an exploit within the LauncherFrame.java within the minecraft.jar launcher. The method “login(String userName, String password)” should easily be able to me modified to (still connect to the server for validity), but set the username to a new String (declared in the globals), and actually use this set string as the username to call “launcher.init(userName, null, null, null);” within the method “canPlayOffline(String userName)”.

I think this is more than enough information for someone to decompile the needed class, repair it, and exploit it. I am currently working on setting up Jode (doesn’t wanna work for some reason) to use to compare side-by-side with my Jad made LauncherFrame.java. This (i believe) is the only class that needs modifying to exploit the entire minecraft game (mostly), as within the “login(String userName, String password)” method, you can also trick it to ALWAYS think it was a successful login if you wanted to.

Please give some credits if you do this before I do and it works (as It was my idea right?)[/s]

Finished a proof of concept, I am not 100% sure this will work in mac (confirmed windows and linux) (if someone could please confirm for mac), as I am currently fixing this in Linux, I will try to reboot into Win7 test it out and see how it goes. I do not believe this will download the newest version as I think I have disabled that (it requires a login stuff from what I have read, but I have provided the client with a bit of false information from a previous login of my own. No danger to my account though.

Update:
Now auto-updates to the newest version even with bad login details (unpaid account or un-registered)

Download:
http://uppit.com/of8wdqxlcrmw/minecraft.jar[/quote]

Read full topic

Edit: Could you list the classes you changed because they already updated it (extra features) but they didn’t do the verification so might be able to replace them…[/quote]
Changed nothing yet as I am debating what is going to be the best way to go about doing this. I can see 4 approaches to cracking it, but I want to look at the code more to see which one will be easier.

Read full topic

item.title: Cracked Launcher (UPDATED)
item.dc:creator: @Mew32 Mew32
item.description:
@Mew32 wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:33, topic:383335”][quote author=Mew32 link=topic=479115.msg3711761#msg3711761 date=1313387473]

Could you crack http://minedev.net/BukkitContrib/Spoutcraft.jar ? that would be awesome…

Why do you want that cracked? I have to use my phone as my pc screen so it’s a bit difficult to program. Give me a good enough reason and i’ll do my to crack it.

It is a launcher for minecraft which is going to feature a client side mod system with bukkit where you can join a modded server and it downloads the mods for you and you can then join a server which is totally vanilla without closing the client…
If you don’t want to crack it, could you help me crack it at least? (I am a complete noob at this)
[/quote]Good reason to me.[/quote]
Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Cracked Launcher (UPDATED)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Nueb35, post:23, topic:383335”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=479115.msg3510671#msg3510671 date=1298522740]

Fixed it so it will now auto-update, I believe this will enable to full ability for MITB to upgrade his server without worries.

the download ticket and session ids are temporary, the client checks to see if its the one assigned to that specific username, you cant just assign random values to them, or values which were assigned to someone else for that matter

Because it doesn’t work or something? I have tested this and it works fine, complain if you want about what I did wrong, but it works, so obviously whatever I fucked up on worked.
[/quote]
I’m not saying you fucked up, I just tested it works fine, I overestimated the makers of the game, you can actually go to http://s3.amazonaws.com/MinecraftDownload/minecraft.jar and download the jar without a username or download ticket LOL[/quote]
To be quite honest, here in about 1-2 months your overestimation will be correct though. Notch plans to use the new launcher, and hook up HTTPS to the downloading so he can double check the download ticket.

Read full topic

item.title: Cracked Launcher (UPDATED)
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Ahahaha, that’s the launcher I use for Minecraft. This works because of the session ID that is used to communicate with the Minecraft authorization server. Once you have it, you can easily log on to any server (i.e. MoparScape’s) with any username.

Read full topic
